QuestData.Title: Bounty on Murlocs
QuestData.Description: The Stormwind Army has placed a bounty on murloc lurkers and foragers in Elwynn. Slaughter them and bring Guard Thomas their torn murloc fins, and the Stormwind Army will reward you well.$B$BThe murlocs have built a village at Stone Cairn Lake north of here, and another to the south where the stream forks.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring 8 Torn Murloc Fins to Guard Thomas at the east Elwynn bridge.
QuestData.RewardText: You have the fins? Great! Marshal Dughan is anxious about the Murloc situation in eastern Elwynn, and I'd like to tell him that it's becoming under control.$B$BYour actions have helped realize that.
